title.rendered: BOSS AIR TRAILER KIT – SQUARE AXLE

content.rendered:
BOSS AIR TRAILER KIT – SQUARE AXLE

Boss Air Trailer Kit to suit Square Axle available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

This kit is for air bagging trailers with a square axle and square chassis. Top bracket is slotted for mounting.

The ideal gap between the axle and the top mounting point is around 200mm.

Kit Includes;

  • 2 x Boss Extreme Series Double Bellow Airbags
  • 4 x brackets (2 upper & 2 lower)
  • Mounting Hardware
  • Quality SAE J844 Government Approved Airline
  • Dual Schrader Valves Mounted in Stainless Panel
  • Instructions for fitting

Boss Extreme series airbags are rated at 2500lb or 1136kg per side and have been government approved tested to over 750psi.

Average dual cab ute will run around 15-45psi depending on load.

Boss has sold over 13000 load assist kits in Australia, proven over time with 4WD enthusiasts, Mining companies, Tradies, 4WD Tour Operators as well as in Agricultural Vehicles, Trailers and motorhomes, limited only to your imagination.

To get the best performance from your kit, inflate airbags just enough to achieve a level ride height. By doing this you are also allowing all of the suspension components to share the extra load of the vehicle and not putting any unnecessary pressure on any one individual part of your vehicles suspension.

To view the range of Boss Air products available, CLICK HERE!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
